授業方法:
THIS COURSE WILL BE CONDUCTED ON ZOOM, BUT WE MAY DO SOME FACE TO FACE CLASSES. Hence, if you cannot attend face to face classes, you should not take this class.

In this course, students will engage in discussion, presentation, pair work and group work tasks in an all English classroom.

第13回: Review and preparation for final presentation
トピック.授業計画1: This course will blend teacher-centered lecture style instruction with student-centered discussion. We will have discussions, presentations and group projects throughout the semester. The class outline and pace of the class outlined above may be adjusted in response to student needs.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will need to spend an average of two hours outside of class to prepare for each class. Two hours is an estimate, the actual time spent on homework will vary according to students reading speed. They will be expected to complete all the assigned tasks before each class because they will not be able to participate fully in class if they do not complete their homework. Students who do not purchase the textbook will not be able to complete their homework.
